channel.title: Accessibility on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Accessibility on LiaScript

item.title: LiaEx: Funding for the LiaScript-Exporter
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that our LiaScript-Exporter, now developed under the name LiaEx, has received funding through the OE_Sprints program of the German Federal Ministry for Family Affairs, Senior Citizens, Women and Youth (BMBFSFJ)!
